title: Eden peace-themed single-page site with guestbook (frontend)

requirements.summary: Build a responsive single-page Eden site with hero, About, How Eden Brings Peace, and footer sections using polished English copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders without errors on desktop and mobile widths
Page contains, at minimum: a hero section, an “About Eden” section, a “How Eden Brings Peace” section, and a footer
All user-facing text is in English and consistently references Eden’s peace mission

file_operations.description: Create the single-page layout (hero, About Eden, How Eden Brings Peace, Messages of Peace guestbook section placeholder, footer) with responsive structure and polished English copy.
Ensure document metadata supports the Eden single-page experience (title/description as needed) while keeping English-only user-facing text.
Create a header component that anchors navigation to page sections (single-page in-page links) and provides consistent top-level structure.
Create a footer component with concise Eden peace mission copy and required logo/mark placement wiring (actual mark usage implemented under REQ-5).

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive peaceful Eden visual theme (palette, typography, spacing, hierarchy) consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently across all sections (headings, body text, buttons/links, cards)
Color palette and typography communicate a calm/peaceful aesthetic and are readable with sufficient contrast
Layout uses consistent spacing and a clear visual hierarchy

file_operations.description: Create global styling and theme tokens (calm palette, readable typography defaults, consistent spacing rules) and set base styles for body, headings, links, and section spacing.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (colors/radius/shadows/typography defaults) to support the Eden peaceful aesthetic consistently across sections.
Create a reusable section wrapper component to enforce consistent spacing, max-width, and hierarchy across hero/about/how/guestbook/footer sections.

requirements.summary: Add a “Messages of Peace” guestbook section with a validated submission form and latest-messages list that updates without full refresh.
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend includes a form with validation (non-empty message; reasonable max lengths) and a list of submitted entries
Backend stores guestbook entries persistently and returns them in reverse-chronological order
Submitting a message updates the list in the UI without a full page refresh

file_operations.description: Implement the “Messages of Peace” section UI: name (optional) + message form, inline validation, submit loading/error states, and a reverse-chronological list view rendered from fetched entries.
Create a React Query-based hook to fetch entries and submit a new entry, invalidating/refetching the entries list on successful submission (no full page reload).
Create a small client wrapper around the existing backend interface (addEntry/getAllEntries) to be used by the guestbook hook for safe, typed calls.
Wire the GuestbookSection into the single-page layout so it is reachable as a clear section and uses the shared theme/section wrapper.

requirements.summary: Add the required generated images as static assets and wire them into the hero and header/footer as Eden visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend
Hero section displays the hero image appropriately (responsive sizing, no distortion)
Site displays the Eden mark/logo in the header and/or footer

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero image asset at the exact required path: frontend/public/assets/generated/eden-hero.dim_1920x1080.png.
Add the generated Eden mark asset at the exact required path: frontend/public/assets/generated/eden-mark.dim_512x512.png.
Create the hero section that references frontend/public/assets/generated/eden-hero.dim_1920x1080.png with responsive sizing (no distortion) and overlays Eden peace-mission copy.
Wire the Eden mark into the header by referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/eden-mark.dim_512x512.png (ensure accessible alt text and responsive sizing).
Optionally repeat the Eden mark in the footer by referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/eden-mark.dim_512x512.png to satisfy the mark placement requirement.
Wire HeroSection into the page top so the generated hero image is visible on initial load and consistent with the overall single-page structure.
